lead_paragraph: England face a tough task to save the fourth test against South Africa but history shows that the tourists are capable of frustrating their opponents, fast bowler James Anderson said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Anderson Promises England Fight to Save Test
headline.main: Anderson Promises England Fight to Save Test

snippet: England face a tough task to save the fourth test against South Africa but history shows that the tourists are capable of frustrating their opponents, fast bowler James Anderson said on Monday....
